basics.name: Hanlin Sheng
basics.label: Ph.D. candidate
basics.summary: Hanlin Sheng currently works at the School of Earth and Space Sciences, University of Science and Technology of China, supervised by Prof. Xinming Wu. Hanlin does research in Geophysics and Artificial Intelligence.

location.address: University of Science and Technology of China, No.96, JinZhai Road Baohe District

work.name: University of Science and Technology of China
work.summary: Teaching Assistant in ESS1502 Artificial Intelligence in Geosciences
